participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, always seeking inspiration in the world around him.
participant_1.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, she finds joy in teaching and inspiring young minds.
participant_2.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i love to play board games. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.
